  ## Installation
  ```shell
    npm install
  ```
  
  
  ## Usage

  ### Setup Instructions

  1. Clone the repo

  ```shell
  git@github.com:mlarkin14/Professional-README-Generator.git
  ```

  2. Move to the project root directory

```shell
cd professional-readme-generator
```

3. Run npm install

```shell
npm install
```

4. Run Readme Generator

```shell
node index.js
```
